summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.8°C) and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5496 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 11038 lux), cloud levels (up 1817 m), outside temperature (up 1.5°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 234.9m lower than yesterday, 728.9m lower than the past week, 1817.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 832.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1561.0m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and near calm conditions. Periods of rain anticipated, occasional overcast conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
